meaning_str.bing:
n. 〈文学〉名人；【动】狮子；勇士；名流
网络. 恶魔巫师；狮牌；勇猛的人

恶魔巫师；狮牌；勇猛的人

狮；狮子；杰出人物；名人；文坛巨匠；社交界名流；勇壮（或勇敢）的人；象征勇气（或力量）的事物

1.en: the lion, is fear of him not in the least.
1.cn: 从此农民立即看不起狮子了，至少不再怕它了。

2.en: When he got married, he took elephant, lion and monkeys to his wedding.
2.cn: 他结婚时，带着大象、骆驼、狮子和猴子去参加他的婚礼。

3.en: The beautiful music rose , then the lion sat down and began to enjoy the music.
3.cn: 动听的音乐响起了，只见那狮子坐了下来，它开始欣赏起了这美妙的旋律。

0.en: Really interesting is that you know, for many people, a lion is a frightening animal, but here it is funny, comic.
0.cn: 真是有意思，对许多人来说，狮子是让人生畏的动物。不过在这里，狮子又有趣又滑稽。

1.en: Can I have a kangaroo? A lion, please. A monkey, please. A parrot, please. Yes, I've got all those.
1.cn: 我要一个袋鼠气球我要一个狮子。我要一个猴子。一个鹦鹉，谢谢你。好的，这些我都有。

2.en: Peppa is going to be a fairy. I grant you one wish. My wish is to be Queen Suzy. And Leo Lion will be the jester.
2.cn: 佩奇要扮成仙女。我准许你许一个愿望。我的愿望是我要做苏西女王。那么狮子里奥就来做小丑吧。

3.en: Yeah. Frightening is just one face for the lion. Okay. He also has many other faces. Right. Just like now, he is drinking wine. It's brilliant.
3.cn: 是啊。让人害怕只是狮子的一面。它还有很多其它特点。对。就像现在，它在喝酒。太精彩了。

4.en: Are you sure there isn't someone else, Peppa? There is someone else. King Leo Lion. Roar. It's an honor to meet you, King Leo.
4.cn: 你确定吗，不是还有另外一个人吗？是还有另外一个人啊，是国王狮子里奥。很荣幸能见到你，里奥国王。

5.en: All right, that's television and movies. Section nine: miscellany. The apartment's flag is a gold lion rampant on a field of azure.
5.cn: 好了，电视以及电影协议完成了。第九部分，杂项，公寓旗帜是一头在天蓝色背景下两腿站立的金色狮子。

6.en: Hello Peppa. Hello Suzy. This is my new friend, Leo Lion. Where is he? There is no one there. Suzy has made up a pretend friend.
6.cn: 你好啊，佩奇！你好啊，苏西！这是我的新朋友，狮子里奥。他在哪呢？那里没有人啊。苏西虚构了一个假想的朋友出来。

7.en: Hello Leo. Peppa pretend that she can see Leo Lion. Leo, Will you be my friend too? What did he say? He is nodding his head. That means yes.
7.cn: 你好啊，里奥。佩奇假装看见了狮子里奥。里奥，你也能做我的朋友吗？他说了什么呀？他点了点他的头。代表他同意了。

8.en: Yet out of the ashes of this tragedy, we shall rise to greet the dawning of a new era in which lion and hyena come together in a great and glorious future.
8.cn: 但是我们，必须振作起来，忘掉悲痛共同迎接一个崭新时代的来临，我们狮子将跟土狼一起走向光明伟大的未来。

9.en: My mother, when she first cooked this dish for me, she made a big thing about it. She said, you know, "If you eat this Lion Head meatballs, you'll be as strong as lions!" And I believed her.
9.cn: 我妈妈第一次为我做这道菜时非常地重视。她说“吃了这道菜，你就会和狮子一样强壮。”我相信她。

10.en: Leo Lion said he can't finish his cake, so George can have it. Can we play upstairs now? Yes. Let's play dressing up. I was asking Leo. Oh.
10.cn: 狮子里奥说这块蛋糕他吃不完了，请乔治把它吃。我们现在能去楼上玩吗？可以，我们来玩打扮的游戏。我刚在是在问里奥呢。噢。

11.en: One great dish that always reminds me of family gatherings is Lion Head meatballs.
11.cn: 经常让我想起家人团聚的美味菜肴就是狮子头。

12.en: Now, it's not just the meatballs, that's gonna finish the dish and make them look like lion heads.
12.cn: 为了完成这道菜，让它们看起来像狮子头，光有肉丸不够。

13.en: Cover in foil and into the oven for half an hour on a low heat, about 100 degrees centigrade, and after 30 minutes, out they come with the Chinese cabbage beautifully wilted, the stock infused and the lion head meatballs fit for an emperor.
13.cn: 盖上锡纸，放入烤箱，低温大约100摄氏度烤半小时，30分钟后，皇帝的御膳，狮子头，佐以吸收了鲜美汤汁的大白菜，就大功告成了。

14.en: Oh, and Ross was like what? A lion tamer?
14.cn: 难不成罗斯是训兽师吗？

15.en: Dragon lion dance and kung fu. So they are all connected? Yeah, yeah, just like... The lion dance is also like this. OK? OK. OK. So you see the Dragon dancer?
15.cn: 舞龙，舞狮和功夫，这些都相关吗？是的，就像这样...舞狮也是这个动作。哦。是的。你看那些舞龙的人。

16.en: Mummy, Suzy's got a pretend friend, he is called Leo Lion. I see, and does he like fruit cake too? Roar. Leo loves fruit cake.
16.cn: 妈妈，苏西她有一个假想的朋友，他叫里奥。我知道了，那他也喜欢水果蛋糕吗？里奥他可喜欢水果蛋糕。

17.en: So this is a key part of any Chinese New Year celebration is having a dragon being part of that? Yes. Dragons and lion dance and kung fu.
17.cn: 所以这是中国新年庆典里重要部分就是得有舞龙。是的。舞龙，舞狮和功夫。

18.en: And in China, the art is to make them as big as possible to resemble the head of the lion. And the Emperor used to eat this dish because it was a symbol of power.
18.cn: 在中国，关键是要把肉丸做得尽量大，以象征狮头。皇帝也吃这道菜因为这是权力的象征。

19.en: Only the most advanced kung fu artists are allowed to be lion dancers. It takes two performers in complete synchronicity, like a highly acrobatic pantomime horse.
19.cn: 只有功夫最高超的师傅才有资格舞狮。两名表演者需要完全同步，这类似于技艺高超的哑剧马。
